abstract: I.B.M. plans to announce a set of social software tools typically associated with sites like MySpace and Facebook to the corporate world.
snippet: I.B.M. plans to announce a set of social software tools typically associated with sites like MySpace and Facebook to the corporate world.
lead_paragraph: And you thought social networking was all about text-messaging among bored teenagers.

headline.main: I.B.M. to Introduce Workers’ Networking Software
headline.print_headline: I.B.M. to Introduce Workers’ Networking Software
